Reviews.Title: Nice little phone
Reviews.Author: Alisa D. Combs "spoiled_1"
Reviews.Content: This is my 1st smartphone. So far I love it!  It is a pretty light purple color. It comes with a notification charm which flashes when you get a call or text. It also comes with headphones and a charging dock that doubles as a speaker. It fits my hands perfectly. Has average battery life. You can make your own ringtones without downloading any apps. The only drawback is that it doesn't have FM radio but with an 8 GB SD card you can save plenty of music on it.

Reviews.Title: One Year Later...
Reviews.Author: PenPalMeHere
Reviews.Content: I got this phone when I started my contract with Verizon a little over a year ago. It's always had a protective case and a screen protector on it as I am a little OCD about my electronics. I've never dropped it on concrete, tile, in water or any other hard or damaging surfaces to cause it any harm - it's still in "like new" condition as far as looks. It was used moderately for phone calls, text and web browsing - never came close to reaching my minutes each month, sent 1,500 ish texts a month, and only used my browser when a computer wasn't readily available.Yet after 12+ months of use and the phone has stopped functioning correctly. It started resetting it's self randomly once or twice a day for about a week, but now it resets it's self more than it stays on and at this point it is unusable.While the phones features are good, I wouldn't suggest this phone to anyone. I've recently googled my resetting issue and have found many other similar complaints. I was happy to get a free phone when signing up, but in the end it will cost me the price of a new phone in order to replace it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely terrible
Reviews.Author: apropos1
Reviews.Content: This phone initially had great reviews- however, having owned this phone for over a year, I can say it is the worst phone I have ever owned in my history of owning cell phones (which includes the old-timey flip phones). The reception is worse than terrible. What has frequently happened is that while calling, indoors or outdoors, if i accidentally cover any of the tiny holes on the back of the phone, the person on the end can no longer comprehend what i'm saying. When I change my finger placement it then improves.  The speakers on the phone, no matter who i am talking to, are also horrendous. Even if the reception is fair, the speakers render your voice incomprehensible.The battery life has become extremely poor. Without doing anything but sitting on the counter, it will run down to half life and require recharging.The docking station has failed on and off as a speaker.  I am not aware of its current functionality as a speaker - i refuse, after already having had to replace the phone within the first 6-8 months, to waste more time on it.  The docking station recently failed altogether even as a phone charger. I switched to charging by plugging in manually, and ended up cutting off the plug that covers the phone's charging port b/c you really have to have a pry tool or long, strong fingernail to get that open. The plug is designed to snap shut automatically, so cutting it off was the best and only solution to dealing with it.The battery is not removable, so if you ever get stuck and have to do a reboot, you have to memorize a the key sequence that will restart it, you cannot simply pull the battery.Everybody i call regularly hates this phone and is incessantly bugging me to change it due to its lack of reliability - ie, horrible reception, anytime I need to make a call.  If I were stuck in an emergency somewhere, this is definitely not the phone I would want to have with me.

Reviews.Title: bad experience with this cell phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have only been using the phone for about fourth months. And I can't make phone calls or view my apps. When I try to call out it doesn't register it until about 30-45 minutes later. It's the worse phone I have ever had.Yet after 4 months of use and the phone has stopped functioning correctly. It started resetting it's self randomly once or twice a day for about a week, but now it resets it's self more than it stays on and at this point it is unusable.

Reviews.Title: Good for a year
Reviews.Author: Bethanie
Reviews.Content: I got this phone over a year ago from a version store. But a year after I bought it it started having glitches and crashes.

Reviews.Title: This phone is great!
Reviews.Author: Leigh Lester Holmes
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed using this phone.  I wanted a small cell phone.  I am not really into the huge half phone / half netbooks available today, but I also wanted good functionality and this phone is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Don't get this phone
Reviews.Author: beckyz15
Reviews.Content: I have this phone from October 2011 it was working fine then. But now it drop calls, the screen goes in and out, battery life suck and other problems this phone have. Htc rhyme was my first smartphone but I  am upgrade to the Galaxy s4.

Reviews.Title: Inaudabe to others after a year of minimal usage
Reviews.Author: Sharyn Ross
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for only one year. I don't use it too often. Voice breaks up a lot since in the beginning. It started to faulter for the worse as people on the other end couldn't hear me talk.  I change my hand positions so as not to block the microphone to no avail.  It was never dropped or bumped.  A lot of good this phone is to me if I cant have a conversation.  My daughter also has this same phone.  She needed a new battery, and it is IMPOSSIBLE!! to change out the battery, since it is built into the phone and not removable.  I fond the texting keyboard to be off evn though I calibrated it many times. Still under contract - going to have to look for a cheap replacement phone until I can re-new my contract.  I would not recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Okay phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Morgan
Reviews.Content: This phone works. It's not awesome, but it's fine for texting, calling, camera, and navigation, which is pretty much all I use it for. There's a strip at the top of the phone I got where the touch screen won't work, but it's not that big of a deal for me to send it back. It's a little slow, and the battery life is on the short end of average (but I may be biased since my last phone was a Droid Razr Maxx and the battery would last for a week). All in all, good cheap phone if you need a replacement but I wouldn't buy it new with a contract.

Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: Allie
Reviews.Content: I get that it's a used phone, but, I didn't exactly expect to get a BEAT up phone. scratches all over, screen flickers, NEVER stays charged, the volume buttons hardly work, barley picks up service, anywhere..Although, I must admit, the picture quality is great!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Headley
Reviews.Content: I dislike just about everything about this phone. It worked fine for the first few weeks, now it glitches all the time. Slow reaction time when I hit buttons and I'm pretty sure the touchscreen is losing it's sensitivity.

Reviews.Title: great little phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Templin
Reviews.Content: My mother has found this phone very easy to use and it was simple to connect it to the network of our choice.

Reviews.Title: HTC Rhyme
Reviews.Author: Barbara Chauvin
Reviews.Content: The service has been great, unfortunately my phone was defective, but my contact (David) has been working with all the way.He is working to make it all good.

Reviews.Title: Good replacement
Reviews.Author: pam anglin
Reviews.Content: I had one and it stopped working.  I was glad to find a replacement so I can make it until my contract expires.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: hlywdvet
Reviews.Content: this was a good replacement for my daughters broken phone. easy switchover and a good price. i would use them a again.

Reviews.Title: The HTC Rhyme I purchased has a couple glitches, but over all it is working well.
Reviews.Author: Jama R. Baltrip
Reviews.Content: The HTC Rhyme I purchased has a couple glitches, but over all it is working well. Good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: RITA JO MCGEE "rmcgee"
Reviews.Content: I have only been using the phone for about a week.  And I can't make phone calls or view my apps.  When I try to call out it doesn't register it until about 30-45 minutes later.  It's the worse phone I have ever had.

Reviews.Title: Ad was completely misleading! Didn't receive what I was expecting.
Reviews.Author: Nichole Smalley
Reviews.Content: The ad was very misleading. Ad said that it came in the original box with all the accessories, including 4 cases. I received nothing from the box and didn't even get the box. and didn't get the cases I was expecting because it said in the ad they were included. I had bought this as a replacement phone because I already had the HTC Rhyme and the charging port short circuited, but the battery life on this one is HORRIBLE!!!! Only thing I like about this phone is it's ease of use and the color.

Reviews.Title: Only received the phone & charger
Reviews.Author: Karla Paulino
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, but all I received was the phone and the charger. No headphones,  or charm, not even the doc...

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: Reanna
Reviews.Content: It was a little beat up and when the screen brightens the screen flickers and missing the charger port cover.

Reviews.Title: Daughter bought it
Reviews.Author: rebekah of sunny brook farms
Reviews.Content: My sixteen year old daughter had  bought this for herself, she loves it! Easy to use, light weight, awesome apps, decent camera and so much more!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone Great Service
Reviews.Author: Devon
Reviews.Content: Amazon delievered just like it was advertised brand new, great price, quick serivce. All around a great phone and I love the charger/speaker dock!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Device
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Everyone who enjoys a smartphone that anticipates you thoughts should buy this phone.  It is easy to use in all realms and works very well.  It is fast and if you download the updates then you will have no problems what so ever!  I have had this phone since I renewed my contract with Verizon when the phone came out and have had no problems with mine at all.My daughter decided she wanted this phone also so we bought it from Unlocked Cell Phones Depot.  The phone arrived quickly as expected with no problems at all.  When I had questions they answered promptly and was very courteous in all aspects before and after the purchase.  I would highly recommend the product as well as the company to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: sandi rively
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter ordered this phone but we couldn't use it with the plan we have so we had to return it. I emailed the company and within the hour they responded and sent me instructions on how to return the phone along with printing the shipping label. They received it within 2days and she had a refund deposited back into her account within 24 hours. I was amazed at how easy they made it for me the return was as easy as shopping. I rate this experience at a 5 star

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: junebug
Reviews.Content: Had it before a weeek before it broke.  Froze up on me and I powered the phone off...it never powered back on.  Called Verizon and they told me to hold the power button and volume down key for 10-20 seconds.  Still didn't work.  The phone doesn't have a removable battery which I hate...didn't realize this when I bought it.  Thought it would be an okay in between phone to last me a year before my upgrade.  It didn't even last me a week!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished: unable to charge phone-PISSED!!!
Reviews.Author: upset customer
Reviews.Content: Received the phone on the 9th. Worked fine, had trouble opening the part to charge the phone. Tonight completely lost it. The piece inside needed to charge phone is gone, and now my phone will not charge, even on the speaker. Very upset. Spent $150.00 for a refurbished phone, was not expecting for it to stop working 2 days later! Heated. Will be sending the phone back.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Arinella Jones
Reviews.Content: The actual item received did not match up to what was expected, it said new but it had a nip on top right corner; its included manual seems to be a general manual and not specific to the product as i spent quite some time looking for the clip to release the sim card door, and it turns out the phone carried no sim.Gratefully the phone shipped within specified time, BUT I was only able to view it after the return date as it was brought to a location outside of the USA; none the less found someone who was glad to take it.Regards

Reviews.Title: great when it works
Reviews.Author: Karen Schwarz "ks"
Reviews.Content: When it works, I love it. However, I bought the phone 9/6/12. Stopped working 2/17/13, and Verizon staff unable to help me fix it over the phone. Received second phone which would stop working at times by showing a triangle with an exclamation in the middle. Staff taught me how to reboot by holding the on/off button simultaneously with the volume down button. By 3/7/13 I was unable to reboot. Ordered 3rd phone; received it by 3/8/13. 8/7/13 the phone stopped working again - couldn't see screen (but green flashing light told me I had a message) and couldn't reboot. Ordered a 4th phone. All this in less than 12 months. Next repair/replacement needed, I will ask for a completely different phone.
